Title: Dil Bechara
Writer: Shashank Khaitan (adaptation), Suprotim Sengupta (adaptation), Scott Neustadter (based on "The Fault in Our Stars" screenplay by), Michael H. Weber (based on "The Fault in Our Stars" screenplay by), John Green (based on a novel by)
Actors: Sushant Singh Rajput, Sanjana Sanghi, Sahil Vaid, Saswata Chatterjee
Plot: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.
